TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A food that has nutrients added back that were lost during processing. Examples are bread, pasta, and other products made from white flour that have B vitamins added back.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Alimento al que se le vuelve a añadir los nutrientes que perdieron durante su procesamiento. Por ejemplo, pan, pasta y otros productos hechos de harina blanca a la que se le vuelve a agregar vitaminas B.
